name: Girls Attacked!
description:
Hi everyone!

I originally planned to make an entirely new game that is loosely inspired by my very first game "Shoot!" 

And now it is ready for a beta release! My second game's tentative title is "Girls Attacked!" and it's a full 3d first and third person action game made in Unreal Engine 5!

Thank you so much everyone for supporting my second game! 

Unreal Engine 5 has an enormous amount of possibilities and I'll continue to update this as I learn more.

If you would like to support my work and help me keep on making video games, please visit my boosty or pixiv fanbox page and subscribe! Any amount helps!

https://boosty.to/ckuriyama

https://ckuriyama.fanbox.cc/

https://www.patreon.com/ckuriyama1

If you want to request for a commission, please contact me at kevinso2001@gmail.com so we can discuss details! 😁

Thanks!
developers: The Movies, Artwork and Videogames Page
